DataElement.preferredName: Whole Body Radiation Dosimetry Measurement Method Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the type of whole body dosimetry measurement collection method.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete._The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces._The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete.:The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.:The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting.

Concepts.definition: Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete.
The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces.
The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction.

Concepts.definition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A recording device or display that continuously keeps track of the function, condition, or operation of the system or organism and warns of an abnormal or potentially dangerous situation.

Concepts.definition: A recording device or display that continuously keeps track of the function, condition, or operation of the system or organism and warns of an abnormal or potentially dangerous situation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A device designed to give a visual indication of the condition of a system.

Concepts.definition: A device designed to give a visual indication of the condition of a system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.
